title: Divine Lakshmi Temple Haaram with Coral Drops
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: Intricate Nakshi work depicting Goddess Lakshmi at the pendants with a central floral stone studded design. The arrangement includes temple pendant design adorned with sparkling CZ stones. Coral bead drops add a touch of traditional charm. The stone setting is meticulously crafted, highlighting the brilliance of the CZ stones. Antique gold finish.
occasions: and festive celebrations. A timeless piece for adding a touch of heritage to any special occasion.
description: This exquisitely crafted Temple Haaram showcases the artistry of South Indian goldsmiths. The Lakshmi pendants bring blessings and prosperity, while the coral beads add a touch of auspiciousness. The combination of traditional design and modern elegance makes it a versatile piece that can be treasured for generations. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty.
